verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ־ <WH3091> And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֠וּן <WH5126> of Nun מִֽן־ <WH4480> from הַשִּׁטִּ֞ים <WH7851> out of Shittim שְׁנַֽיִם־ <WH8147> two אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> men מְרַגְּלִים֙ <WH7270> to spy חֶ֣רֶשׁ <WH2791> secretly לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לְכ֛וּ <WH1980> Go רְא֥וּ <WH7200> view אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְרִיח֑וֹ <WH3405> even Jericho וַיֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> went וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <WH935> and came בֵּית־ <WH1004> the house אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> ess זוֹנָ֛ה <WH2181> into an harlot's וּשְׁמָ֥הּ <WH8034> named רָחָ֖ב <WH7343> Rahab וַיִּשְׁכְּבוּ־ <WH7901> and lodged שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

וַיֵּ֣אָמַ֔ר <WH559> And it was told לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יְרִיח֖וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> Behold אֲ֠נָשִׁים <WH582> men בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> Behold there came הֵ֧נָּה <WH2008> here הַלַּ֛יְלָה <WH3915> in hither to night מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לַחְפֹּ֥ר <WH2658> to search out אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the country

וַיִּשְׁלַח֙ <WH7971> sent מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king יְרִיח֔וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho אֶל־ <WH413> to רָחָ֖ב <WH7343> unto Rahab לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying ה֠וֹצִיאִי <WH3318> Bring forth הָאֲנָשִׁ֨ים <WH376> the men הַבָּאִ֤ים <WH935> that are come אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH413> to you אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> to thee which are entered לְבֵיתֵ֔ךְ <WH1004> into thine house כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לַחְפֹּ֥ר <WH2658> to search out אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> all the country בָּֽאוּ׃ <WH935> for they be come

וַתִּקַּ֧ח <WH3947> took הָֽאִשָּׁ֛ה <WH802> And the woman אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> the two הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> men וַֽתִּצְפְּנ֑וֹ <WH6845> and hid וַתֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> them and said כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that בָּ֤אוּ <WH935> thus There came אֵלַי֙ <WH413> about הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> the men וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> unto me but I wist מֵאַ֥יִן <WH370> not whence הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

וַיְהִ֨י <WH1961> came הַשַּׁ֜עַר <WH8179> of the gate לִסְגּ֗וֹר <WH5462> And it came to pass [about the time] of shutting בַּחֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <WH2822> when it was dark וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <WH376> the men יָצָ֔אוּ <WH3318> went out לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> I wot אָ֥נָה <WH575> where הָלְכ֖וּ <WH1980> went הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> the men רִדְפ֥וּ <WH7291> not pursue מַהֵ֛ר <WH4118> them quickly אַחֲרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH310> after כִּ֥י <WH3588> for תַשִּׂיגֽוּם׃ <WH5381> for ye shall overtake

וְהִ֖יא <WH1931> she הֶעֱלָ֣תַם <WH5927> But she had brought them up הַגָּ֑גָה <WH1406> to the roof וַֽתִּטְמְנֵם֙ <WH2934> of the house and hid בְּפִשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH6593> of flax הָעֵ֔ץ <WH6086> them with the stalks הָעֲרֻכ֥וֹת <WH6186> which she had laid in order לָ֖הּ עַל־ <WH5921> on הַגָּֽג׃ <WH1406> upon the roof

וְהָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> the men רָדְפ֤וּ <WH7291> pursued אַֽחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <WH310> after דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> them the way הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> to Jordan עַ֖ל <WH5921> unto הַֽמַּעְבְּר֑וֹת <WH4569> unto the fords וְהַשַּׁ֣עַר <WH8179> the gate סָגָ֔רוּ <WH5462> they shut אַחֲרֵ֕י <WH310> after כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> them יָצְא֥וּ <WH3318> them were gone out הָרֹדְפִ֖ים <WH7291> and as soon as they which pursued אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> after that

וְהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> like טֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> now before יִשְׁכָּב֑וּן <WH7901> And before they were laid down וְהִ֛יא <WH1931> she עָלְתָ֥ה <WH5927> she came up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> up עַל־ <WH5921> to הַגָּֽג׃ <WH1406> unto them upon the roof

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And she said אֶל־ <WH413> to הָ֣אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> the men יָדַ֕עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתַ֧ן <WH5414> hath given יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD לָכֶ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> you the land וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> of you נָפְלָ֤ה <WH5307> is fallen אֵֽימַתְכֶם֙ <WH367> and that your terror עָלֵ֔ינוּ <WH5921> and וְכִ֥י <WH3588> for נָמֹ֛גוּ <WH4127> faint כָּל־ <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> upon us and that all the inhabitants הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִפְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH6440> because

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֗עְנוּ <WH8085> For we have heard אֵ֠ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> how הוֹבִ֨ישׁ <WH3001> dried up יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> how the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֵ֤י <WH4325> the water יַם־ <WH3220> sea סוּף֙ <WH5488> of the Red מִפְּנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> for you בְּצֵאתְכֶ֖ם <WH3318> when ye came out מִמִּצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> and what עֲשִׂיתֶ֡ם <WH6213> and what ye did לִשְׁנֵי֩ <WH8147> unto the two מַלְכֵ֨י <WH4428> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֜י <WH567> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who בְּעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> that [were] on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <WH3383> Jordan לְסִיחֹ֣ן <WH5511> Sihon וּלְע֔וֹג <WH5747> and Og אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הֶחֱרַמְתֶּ֖ם <WH2763> whom ye utterly destroyed אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַנִּשְׁמַע֙ <WH8085> And as soon as we had heard וַיִּמַּ֣ס <WH4549> did melt לְבָבֵ֔נוּ <WH3824> [these things] our hearts וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and no קָ֨מָה <WH6965> neither did there remain ע֥וֹד <WH5750> any ר֛וּחַ <WH7307> any more courage בְּאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> in any man מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> because כִּ֚י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of you for the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God ה֤וּא <WH1931> He אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> he [is] God בַּשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> in heaven מִמַּ֔עַל <WH4605> above וְעַל־ <WH5921> and on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> and in earth מִתָּֽחַת׃ <WH8478> Thahash

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הִשָּֽׁבְעוּ־ <WH7650> Now therefore I pray you swear נָ֥א <WH4994> please לִי֙ בַּֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto me by the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> since עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> I have shewed עִמָּכֶ֖ם <WH5973> with חָ֑סֶד <WH2617> you kindness וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֨ם <WH6213> that ye will also shew גַּם־ <WH1571> you also אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> you עִם־ <WH5973> with בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> house אָבִי֙ <WH1> unto my father's חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> kindness וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם <WH5414> and give לִ֖י א֥וֹת <WH226> token אֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> me a true

וְהַחֲיִתֶ֞ם <WH2421> And [that] ye will save alive אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֣י <WH1> my father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמִּ֗י <WH517> and my mother וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַחַי֙ <WH251> and my brethren וְאֶת־ <WH853> [אַחֹותַי כ] (אַחְיֹותַ֔י <WH269> other ק) וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לָהֶ֑ם וְהִצַּלְתֶּ֥ם <WH5337> and all that they have and deliver אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשֹׁתֵ֖ינוּ <WH5315> our lives מִמָּֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> from death

וַיֹּ֧אמְרוּ <WH559> answered לָ֣הּ הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> the men נַפְשֵׁ֤נוּ <WH5315> her Our life תַחְתֵּיכֶם֙ <WH8478> Thahash לָמ֔וּת <WH4191> for yours אִ֚ם <WH518> if לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תַגִּ֔ידוּ <WH5046> if ye utter אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֵ֖נוּ <WH1697> not this our business זֶ֑ה <WH2088> this וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> shall come בְּתֵת־ <WH5414> hath given יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> And it shall be when the LORD לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> us the land וְעָשִׂ֥ינוּ <WH6213> that we will deal עִמָּ֖ךְ <WH5973> with חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> kindly וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> and truly

וַתּוֹרִדֵ֥ם <WH3381> Then she let them down בַּחֶ֖בֶל <WH2256> by a cord בְּעַ֣ד <WH1157> through הַֽחַלּ֑וֹן <WH2474> the window כִּ֤י <WH3588> for בֵיתָהּ֙ <WH1004> for her house בְּקִ֣יר <WH7023> [was] upon the town הַֽחוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> wall וּבַֽחוֹמָ֖ה <WH2346> upon the wall הִ֥יא <WH1931> she יוֹשָֽׁבֶת׃ <WH3427> and she dwelt

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> And she said לָהֶם֙ הָהָ֣רָה <WH2022> you to the mountain לֵּ֔כוּ <WH1980> Go פֶּֽן־ <WH6435> so יִפְגְּע֥וּ <WH6293> meet בָכֶ֖ם הָרֹדְפִ֑ים <WH7291> lest the pursuers וְנַחְבֵּתֶ֨ם <WH2247> you and hide שָׁ֜מָּה <WH8033> there שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> yourselves there three יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> days עַ֚ד <WH5704> until שׁ֣וֹב <WH7725> be returned הָרֹֽדְפִ֔ים <WH7291> until the pursuers וְאַחַ֖ר <WH310> and afterward תֵּלְכ֥וּ <WH1980> may go לְדַרְכְּכֶֽם׃ <WH1870> your way

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> about הָאֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> the men נְקִיִּ֣ם <WH5355> unto her We [will be] blameless אֲנַ֔חְנוּ <WH587> we מִשְּׁבֻעָתֵ֥ךְ <WH7621> of this thine oath הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הִשְׁבַּעְתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH7650> which thou hast made us swear

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> unless אֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we בָאִ֖ים <WH935> Behold [when] we come בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> into the land אֶת־ <WH853> תִּקְוַ֡ת <WH8615> this line חוּט֩ <WH2339> thread הַשָּׁנִ֨י <WH8144> of scarlet הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this תִּקְשְׁרִ֗י <WH7194> thou shalt bind בַּֽחַלּוֹן֙ <WH2474> in the window אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הוֹרַדְתֵּ֣נוּ <WH3381> which thou didst let us down by ב֔וֹ וְאֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֨יךְ <WH1> thy father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמֵּ֜ךְ <WH517> and thy mother וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַחַ֗יִךְ <WH251> and thy brethren וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> household אָבִ֔יךְ <WH1> and all thy father's תַּאַסְפִ֥י <WH622> and thou shalt bring אֵלַ֖יִךְ <WH413> about הַבָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> home

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> shall come כֹּ֣ל <WH3605> anyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> And it shall be [that] whosoever יֵצֵא֩ <WH3318> shall go out מִדַּלְתֵ֨י <WH1817> of the doors בֵיתֵ֧ךְ ׀ <WH1004> of thy house הַח֛וּצָה <WH2351> into the street דָּמ֥וֹ <WH1818> his blood בְרֹאשׁ֖וֹ <WH7218> [shall be] upon his head וַאֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> we נְקִיִּ֑ם <WH5355> and we [will be] guiltless וְ֠כֹל <WH3605> anyone אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who יִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> shall come אִתָּךְ֙ <WH854> in בַּבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> and whosoever shall be with thee in the house דָּמ֣וֹ <WH1818> his blood בְרֹאשֵׁ֔נוּ <WH7218> [shall be] on our head אִם־ <WH518> if יָ֖ד <WH3027> if [any] hand תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> shall come בּֽוֹ׃

וְאִם־ <WH518> if תַּגִּ֖ידִי <WH5046> And if thou utter אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָרֵ֣נוּ <WH1697> this our business זֶ֑ה <WH2088> this וְהָיִ֣ינוּ <WH1961> become נְקִיִּ֔ם <WH5355> then we will be quit מִשְּׁבֻעָתֵ֖ךְ <WH7621> of thine oath אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הִשְׁבַּעְתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH7650> which thou hast made us to swear

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And she said כְּדִבְרֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1697> According unto your words כֶּן־ <WH3651> so ה֔וּא <WH1931> she וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵ֖ם <WH7971> so [be] it And she sent them away וַיֵּלֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> departed וַתִּקְשֹׁ֛ר <WH7194> and she bound אֶת־ <WH853> תִּקְוַ֥ת <WH8615> line הַשָּׁנִ֖י <WH8144> the scarlet בַּחַלּֽוֹן׃ <WH2474> in the window
